entry.title: Personal Work
entry.content:
âœğŸ»
In the one and a half year study life at the MUST, I also tried to do a lot of things that I had not been exposed to before. For example, I wrote a written review paper, started a company with my team members using the management theories I learned, analyzed social cases with my legal knowledge, introduced products with my marketing knowledge, participated in the HK Accountant Competition, and gave speeches in public and so on. All these have exercised my ability in all aspects and made me improve. ğŸ˜‰
